welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kansas City, where the charm of the Midwest meets the vibrant energy of a bustling city. Known for its jazz music, delicious barbecue, and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kansas City has to offer.

restaurants.name: Don Antonio
restaurants.description: Don Antonio is a mexican restaurant located in Kansas City.
restaurants.address: 7510 State Ave (at N 75th Dr), Kansas City, KS 66112

restaurants.name: Nice Food
restaurants.description: Nice Food is a chinese restaurant located in Kansas City.
restaurants.address: 7557 State Ave (74th & State Ave), Kansas City, KS 66112

restaurants.name: Go Chicken Go
restaurants.description: Go Chicken Go is a fried chicken joint located in Kansas City.

restaurants.name: Italian Delight
restaurants.description: Italian Delight is a pizzeria located in Kansas City.

restaurants.name: Pizza Stop
restaurants.description: Pizza Stop is a pizzeria located in Kansas City.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a restaurant, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private or chartered aircraft, the private terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport provides a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Johnson Executive Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Johnson Executive Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
